title: Jfeat
author: Jfeat
content: In a bit to hurry up in the morning,to be able to meet up,there is the need to tell the holy spirit good morning,and after which you study and meditate on the word of God,and go down on your knees to acknowledge the one who made it possible for you to be counted among the living.More so,you need to understand that every day has a door,so you command the gate of the day open for you,and make some declaration for the day, because everyday is pregnant with great things made available by God,so speak into the invisible to birth them out in the physical.Sometimes when you are in communication with God your phone will be ringing,pls don't pick, it's the¬† devil that wants to distract and stop you from possessing the day.after this then you can touch your phone.A thought for the night.

comments.author: Tallupooh
comments.body: I think that's good. before we go on and see the world. It's good to always remember God first and pray with every teaching, so that we are given fluency in all our activities today.That way, our hearts will be calm, and kept away from anxiety.this is very good, reminding each other to always remember the god who created us.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: I‚Äôm not religious so praying at any time of day isn‚Äôt something I do. If you want me to be honest, the first thing I do in the morning is go for a pee. I get some breakfast & have a shower. I‚Äôm always kinda cranky in the morning, I get tired & don‚Äôt function too good. Some people love the morning but I‚Äôve always been a moody ass. I am much better at staying up very late.

comments.author: Sanni_w
comments.body: As a Muslim, we are taught to always thank God every morning for keeping us alive and healthy. Thanks for the info ‚ò∫Ô∏è

comments.author: Qiubell5
comments.body: Yes, it's good for us to be grateful first. Grateful today we are still alive and still given a chance. üòÑ
